definition: Wanzhou suburban district of north Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
prefecture/(old) province/(old) administrative division/state (e.g. of US)/oblast (Russia)/canton (Switzerland)

sentences.english: This article takes Wanzhou district of Chongqing as the main study subject.
sentences.chinese: 本文以重慶市萬州區爲主要研究對象。
